projects.title: EarthFlix
projects.description: Nature video streaming service modeled after Netflix. This is one of the favorite projects as I have been with it since the beginning of my career as a developer. I have learned many techniques through Earthflix.

projects.title: Unshelled
projects.description: Platform geared towards taco lovers to discover local taco eateries. Designed with Untappd in mind.

projects.title: Ripcamp
projects.description: Online marketplace used to discover hidden surfing spots emulating Hipcamp.

projects.title: Google Keep Clone
projects.description: A full stack todo app clone of Google Keep using the MERN stack.

projects.title: Balbin & Upson Tax Service
projects.description: Freelance work for an online portfolio page for a local tax business.

projects.title: MarioMatch
projects.description: Interactive match-3 game inspired by Bejeweled using retro Mario icons.
